instructions.title: Instructions to Use
instructions.subtitle: Learn how to use each feature step by step

cropHealth.title: Crop Health Diagnosis
cropHealth.step1: Take a clear photo of your affected crop showing disease symptoms
cropHealth.step2: Ensure good lighting and focus on damaged leaves, stems, or fruits
cropHealth.step3: Tap 'Check Crop Health' to upload and analyze the image
cropHealth.step4: Wait for AI analysis and translation to your selected language
cropHealth.step5: Review detailed diagnosis including disease name, severity, and confidence
cropHealth.step6: Follow treatment recommendations and prevention measures provided

marketPrices.title: Market Prices
marketPrices.step1: Use voice recording to ask about crop prices in your preferred language
marketPrices.step2: Speak clearly about specific crops like 'tomato price in Bangalore today'
marketPrices.step3: Wait for speech recognition and AI agent response
marketPrices.step4: Listen to the audio response or read the translated text
marketPrices.step5: Get real-time pricing information and market insights

govSchemes.title: Government Schemes
govSchemes.step1: Ask questions about agricultural government schemes using voice
govSchemes.step2: Inquire about eligibility, benefits, or application processes
govSchemes.step3: Get detailed information about various schemes available
govSchemes.step4: Receive guidance on documentation and application steps
govSchemes.step5: Access comprehensive scheme information in your language

voiceChat.title: Voice Chat Assistant
voiceChat.step1: Start a conversation by tapping the voice chat feature
voiceChat.step2: Either type your question or hold the mic button to record
voiceChat.step3: Ask any agricultural questions in your preferred language
voiceChat.step4: Receive AI-powered responses both in text and audio format
voiceChat.step5: Continue the conversation for follow-up questions or clarifications

cropHealth.title: Crop Health Diagnosis
cropHealth.subtitle: Take a clear photo of the affected leaves
cropHealth.permissionsMessage: We need camera and photo library permissions to help diagnose your crops.
cropHealth.errorCapture: Failed to capture image. Please try again.
cropHealth.errorSelect: Failed to select image. Please try again.
cropHealth.selectImageFirst: Please capture or select an image first.
cropHealth.diagnosisFailedMessage: Unable to analyze the image. Please try again with a clearer photo.

photoTips.title: Tips for better photos
photoTips.tip1: üì± Hold phone steady, close to affected leaves
photoTips.tip2: ‚òÄÔ∏è Use good natural light, avoid shadows

diagnosisResult.title: Diagnosis Results
diagnosisResult.errorMessage: There was an error processing the response

marketPrices.title: Market Prices
marketPrices.subtitle: Get real-time crop prices, market trends, and agricultural insights
marketPrices.voiceSubtitle: Speak in Hindi or Kannada to get instant market information
marketPrices.processingErrorMessage: Failed to process the audio. Please try again.
marketPrices.pleaseWait: Please wait while we process your audio...

currentCropPrices.title: Current Crop Prices
currentCropPrices.description: Get today's market rates for rice, wheat, sugarcane, cotton, and other major crops across different mandis and regions.

priceTrends.title: Price Trends & Analytics
priceTrends.description: Understand price movements over weeks and months. Identify the best time to sell your harvest for maximum profit.

marketInsights.title: Market Insights
marketInsights.description: Get advice on which crops are in high demand, seasonal price patterns, and market conditions in your area.

regionalComparison.title: Regional Price Comparison
regionalComparison.description: Compare prices across different markets and find the best places to sell your produce for better returns.

sampleQuestions.title: Ask Questions Like:
sampleQuestions.question1: "What is today's rice price in Bangalore mandi?"
sampleQuestions.question2: "Show me cotton price trends for this month"
sampleQuestions.question3: "Which crops have the best prices right now?"
sampleQuestions.question5: "When is the best time to sell my sugarcane?"

marketPrices.playbackErrorMessage: Failed to play the recorded audio.

governmentSchemes.title: Government Schemes
governmentSchemes.subtitle: Get information about agricultural schemes, farmer welfare, and relief programs
governmentSchemes.voiceSubtitle: Speak in Hindi or Kannada to get instant scheme information

agriculturalSubsidies.title: Agricultural Subsidies
agriculturalSubsidies.description: Learn about fertilizer subsidies, seed subsidies, equipment purchase schemes, and irrigation support programs available in your region.

farmerWelfare.title: Farmer Welfare Programs
farmerWelfare.description: Get details about PM-KISAN, Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana, pension schemes, and health insurance for farmers.

reliefSupport.title: Relief & Emergency Support
reliefSupport.description: Information about crop loss compensation, natural disaster relief, debt relief programs, and emergency financial assistance.

creditLoans.title: Credit & Loan Schemes
creditLoans.description: Find out about KCC (Kisan Credit Card), agricultural loans, interest subsidies, and microfinance options for farmers.

trainingDevelopment.title: Training & Skill Development
trainingDevelopment.description: Learn about agricultural training programs, modern farming techniques, and skill development initiatives for farmers.

sampleQuestions.title: Ask Questions Like:
sampleQuestions.question1: "How can I apply for PM-KISAN scheme?"
sampleQuestions.question5: "What relief is available for crop damage?"
sampleQuestions.question6: "Are there any schemes for organic farming?"

voiceChat.title: Voice Chat Assistant
voiceChat.subtitle: Ask questions about farming, crops, and agriculture
voiceChat.welcomeMessage: Hello! I'm your agricultural assistant. You can ask me questions about farming, crop prices, diseases, government schemes, and more. How can I help you today?
voiceChat.errorMessage: Sorry, I encountered an error. Please try again.
voiceChat.processingErrorMessage: Failed to process your request. Please try again.
